SELECT user.*, user_mypage.*, FORMAT(user_mypage.subscribers, 0) AS subscribers FROM project.user LEFT JOIN project.user_mypage ON user.influUserId = user_mypage.influUserId WHERE user.category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{category}, '%') AND ( CASE WHEN #{shorts} = 'true' THEN (user_mypage.shorts LIKE '%true%') WHEN #{shorts} = 'false' THEN (user_mypage.shorts LIKE '%false%') ELSE (user_mypage.shorts LIKE '%true%' OR user_mypage.shorts LIKE '%false%') END ) AND ( CASE WHEN #{price} = 'under30' THEN ((user_mypage.avgviewers * 0.001) * 30) < 30 WHEN #{price} = 'over30' THEN ((user_mypage.avgviewers * 0.001) * 30) BETWEEN 30 AND 100 WHEN #{price} = 'over100' THEN ((user_mypage.avgviewers * 0.001) * 30) BETWEEN 100 AND 300 WHEN #{price} = 'over300' THEN ((user_mypage.avgviewers * 0.001) * 30) > 300 ELSE ((user_mypage.avgviewers * 0.001) * 30) END ) AND ( CASE WHEN #{sub} = 'under10' THEN (user_mypage.subscribers < 100000) WHEN #{sub} = 'over10' THEN (user_mypage.subscribers BETWEEN 100000 AND 200000) WHEN #{sub} = 'over20' THEN (user_mypage.subscribers BETWEEN 200000 AND 500000) WHEN #{sub} = 'over50' THEN (user_mypage.subscribers BETWEEN 500000 AND 1000000) WHEN #{sub} = 'over100' THEN (user_mypage.subscribers > 1000000) ELSE (user_mypage.subscribers) END ) AND ( CASE WHEN #{avg} = 'under1000' THEN (user_mypage.avgviewers < 1000) WHEN #{avg} = 'over1000' THEN (user_mypage.avgviewers BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000) WHEN #{avg} = 'over5000' THEN (user_mypage.avgviewers BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000) WHEN #{avg} = 'over10000' THEN (user_mypage.avgviewers > 10000) ELSE (user_mypage.avgviewers) END ) ORDER BY user_mypage.subscribers DESC;
